App.title: Promptopia App
App.description: Promptopia App - By Javascript Mastery and Martin Santa Clara

HomePage.description: Promptopia is an open-source AI prompting tool for modern world to discover, create and share creative prompts.

FormFeed.inputPlaceholder: Search for a tag or a username

Createpost.title: New Post
Createpost.description: A new post will be created

Form.subtitle: {type} and share amazing prompts with the world, and let your imagination run wild with any AI-powered platform
Form.error: An error has occurred, the action has not been completed

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.head: My Profile
Profile.subtitle: Welcome to your personalized profile page.

Post.title: Posts
Post.authorizedDesc: Welcome to your posts. Share your exceptional prompts and inspire others with the power of your imagination
Post.notAuthorizedDesc: Welcome to {userName}'s posts. Explore {userName}'s exceptional prompts and be inspired by the power of their imagination

ForgotPassword.text: Please use the same email address that you used to create your account
ForgotPassword.label: Email Address

EnterToken.text: Check your email and enter token that we have sent you below.

NewPassword.text: Almost done! Now just enter a new password.
NewPassword.success: The password has been changed successfully!

SendToken.userError: We could not locate a user with that email address

VerifyToken.error: Token did not match, please try again.

Signin.emailSignup: or use your data for registration
Signin.signinMessage: To keep connected with us please login
Signin.signupMessage: Create your account and start your journey with us.

ActivateAccountEmail.heading: Thank you for signing up for Promptopia. Your account has been created and must now be activated within 24 hours - click the button below:

ResetPasswordTokenEmail.heading: This is your password reset token

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.

docs.description: Learn more about next-intl in the official docs.
